welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Palos Verdes Estates, the charming coastal city known for its breathtaking views, beautiful beaches, and rich history. We invite you to explore and savor all that our city has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Torrance Airport serves as the primary hub for all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Torrance Airport provides services for private and corporate aircraft.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Tom Bradley International Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is the primary international terminal at LAX, serving flights to and from destinations outside of the United States.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Terminal 1 is used by Southwest Airlines for both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 is used by several international airlines, including Aer Lingus, Air Canada, and Air France.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Terminal 3 serves domestic and international flights for Delta Air Lines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Terminal 4 is used by American Airlines for both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: Terminal 5 serves domestic and international flights for Hawaiian Airlines, JetBlue, and Spirit Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 6
terminals.description: Terminal 6 is used by several international airlines, including Air New Zealand, Avianca, and Volaris.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: Terminal 7 serves domestic and international flights for United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: Terminal 8 is used by several international airlines, including Alaska Airlines, British Airways, and Qantas.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free WiFi network for up to 45 minutes per day.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Compton Airport serves domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Long Beach Municipal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Daugherty Field Terminal
terminals.description: The Daugherty Field Terminal is a smaller terminal used for private and general aviation flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminals.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Santa Monica Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including restaurants, shops, and rental car services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Santa Ynez Airport offers a comfortable and convenient experience for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Municipal Airport provides customs and immigration services for international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights for major airlines such as Alaska Airlines, American Airlines, and United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights for airlines such as JetBlue and Southwest.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free to use.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for commercial flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at El Monte Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
